thread.title: Rihanna to perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News
thread.title_full: Rihanna to perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News

author: Relaxnews
title: Rihanna to perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News
text:
Rihanna is set to be one of the main attractions at this year's catwalk spectacle, which will be beamed around the world on Dec. 8.
Alongside the fashion brand's 16-strong group of Angels, the singer will have support from Selena Gomez and The Weeknd who were both confirmed on Tuesday.
The Victoria's Secret Fashion Show is as much about entertainment and excitement as it is about fashion or catwalk-strutting models and this year's line-up of acts is as always, full of A-list musical performers. For example, as well as being revealed as headliners for this year's show, on Tuesday, Rihanna and The Weeknd were both announced as nominees in a combined seven American Music Awards categories.
